remarks: An "effective" form of Cantor's theorem ~ canth .  For any function ` F ` from the powerset of ` A ` to ` A ` , there are two definable sets ` B ` and ` C ` which witness non-injectivity of ` F ` .  Corollary 1.3 of [KanamoriPincus] p. 416.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2015.)

canth4.2 $e |- B = U. dom W $.
canth4.3 $e |- C = ( `' ( W ` B ) " { ( F ` B ) } ) $.
canth4 $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ F : D --> A /\ ( ~P A i^i dom card ) C_ D ) -> ( B C_ A /\ C C. B /\ ( F ` B ) = ( F ` C ) ) ) $.
